pages.title: Easy Butler
pages.text: With Easy Butler, you can update, and publish your games with ease.When you use Easy Butler, it pushes a .ZIP file to your game page, with the version you have pushed.While Easy Butler relies on Butler to be installed, Easy Butler can automaticly update all the information!If Butler has an update, you can click “Update” on the application, and it will automaticly launch an updater, which elevates permissions, then launches butler with said eleivated permissions, then updates it!Easy huh? Course it is. This basicly adds a GUI to butler, the right way!

pages.title: Flash Player 2
pages.text: Download Latest Visit Support TheCrafters001 Flash Player 2 by TheCrafters001 Want a free, yet powerful flash player, AND video player? This is the right software. This software is a bundle between a flash player and and video player. Keep in mind that Adobe Flash Player (not included) is still required. The video player will start working automatically. This flash player allows you to play all your favorite games! Including: Earn to DieEarn to Die 2Road of the DeadMutilate-a-Doll 2Anything that has a flash version of it. And the video player can play: MP4MP3And a ton more! Files It also now includes an auto-updater. Stay up-to-date with the most current version!

pages.title: TheCrafters001 Launcher
pages.text: Download Beta Visit Support Features Free Software! Free Games! Anything that is free, and works, can be put on here! Everything is virus tested! DescriptionEver wanted a way to get free software? Well now you can! This software contains software, games, etc. all for free! Everything on this launcher is free. Guaranteed! How to BuildDownload Visual Studio 2019 or Higher, download the REPO, extract it to a safe location, open TheCrafters001 Launcher.sln and click the “Start” button in Visual Studio. This will build and run the software!

posts.title: So... I have been thinking...
posts.excerpt: As you know I have started to work on Pokémon Delta Green again. But I was thinking: “Maybe I should get some help…” Now, I have been working on this project as one person for a while now, with help from selected people here and there. But…
posts.text: As you know I have started to work on Pokémon Delta Green again. But I was thinking: “Maybe I should get some help…” Now, I have been working on this project as one person for a while now, with help from selected people here and there. But… But I was thinking maybe I should make the project open source, and see what people can bring to the table.What do you think? I can get help reworking the map, fix spelling errors, and have people make translations if I get help like this. And, if I am correct, this would be the first ever fan game to make their game open-source. I think I should do it. But sadly, that would mean I have to remove the trophies and stuff. I would REALLY like your opinion. Please let me know. Thanks!
posts.author: TheCrafters001

posts.title: My View on the New FTC Law
posts.excerpt: So… The time has finally come that YouTube could die.
posts.text: So… The time has finally come that YouTube could die. All because they decided to break the law, and open their mouth. This would have never of happened if they said nothing. All YouTube had to do was just sit and stay quite. Nope. They thought it was a good idea to say that they were purposefully showing targeted ads to kids. Who would of thought? And this “Age Rating System” they came up with, is ALSO ignoring the law. On Purpose. Because they say they will not make enough money if they include what is said in the law. The law states that there IS a middle ground. There is a General Audience Exception. In. The. LAW. But YouTube ignored it. And for content creators who think that moving to a new platform, like Vlare or Vimeo, think again. Whatever the law says, and someone makes something similar to the thing, the law follows. COPPA is not just confined to YouTube, it is confined to EVERYONE. There is no stopping the law.Now, I should not be affected too much, as I target people over 13, and the fact that I don’t use cookies to collect information on people, and I don’t track people on my apps. But if the law says no, they say no. I have never had ADS on my website, never will. Hence my slogan, “Redefining Free.” But if the government has people that LITERALLY DON’T HAVE CELLPHONES, they you guys are in trouble, no matter what. My advice? Stop Targeted Ads; Stop Tracking Cookies.I am now going to leave some videos on peoples thoughts on the matter.
posts.author: TheCrafters001

posts.title: Should I Publish My Launcher?
posts.text: Hello! If you have been looking at my post for a while, you may remember that I posted that I am working on my own software launcher. As of this post, I have published beta 0.1.6, and I was wondering if I should post it on other platforms, other than GitHub. In it’s current state, it has the following programs: Visual Studio Visual Studio Code VideoLAN VLC Easy Butler (my program) And it also includes Auto Update. To check for an update, you click “About,” and “Check for Update.” Let me know if you guys want to see this be published on GameJolt and Itch.IO!

posts.title: When Is The Next Pokemon Delta Green Update?
posts.text: This post is regarding the next update in Pokemon Delta Green.If you think this post is about how it is not going to be finished, your are very wrong. I have been working on this project for OVER 3 years now. I am not going to drop it just like that. I want to say that the update may not be done for a while, as I am going to be working on a lot of bug fixes, story elements, and grammar/typo fixes. That means I am going to go through map by map and fix any issues with the dialog. I am also going to be going through and redesigning maps. This will have some-what of an effect on the story, because I may alter it to fit the town you are in.That means I am also going to be working on the Gym Leaders. I will be working on their personalities this update. This way you can feel more attached to them. But before I start any of this, I am going to take a break. I will resume some time in December, after the GameOff Game Jam 2019 voting ends.
posts.author: TheCrafters001
